item.description:
How about we start off with a 9.2 mile loop around the F. Gilbert Hills Park (meet at parking lot - 45 Mills Rd). Weather permitting but I'll stay on top of NECN/TWC updates and post if the ride needs to be postponed. Perhaps afterwards we can head up to Waxy O'Connors for a beer and some light bites (don't think men clad in spandex will offend the patrons!?).

This will be a *relatively* quick one so depending on the group, we could always tack on a couple extra miles or another loop for a challenge.

I'll be there with my black Toyota Matrix, red helmet and red Giant hybrid. This is a road ride.


9.2 Mile State Park Loop
item.how_to_find_us: Red Giant Hybrid (t-bars) and a Red Helmet
item.name: Easy Like Sunday...Afternoon - State Forest Loop
